short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI PDF Chat & Translation Tool for Research Papers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop wasting time switching between tools when reading research papers. Our AI for PDF solution integrates everything you need directly into your PDF documents—explanations, translations, citations, and more—right at your fingertips.

Our Homepage: https://www.themoonlight.io/
Demo Video: https://youtu.be/qYp2N6XCKCE?si=kyOiFwXq4RKxLcGj

Key Features
1. AI Text Explanation - PRO
  When you want to know about a complicated or difficult-to-understand sentence, word, or formula, just select the text and click the Explain button, and the AI will provide a detailed explanation.

2. Chat with PDF - PRO
  When you enter a question in the description box about the content of the paper or enter a question after selecting the text, you can see a detailed answer based on the content of the paper, which will help you better understand the context of the paper.

3. Translate PDF text - FREE
  When you come across a word you don't know the meaning of while reading a paper, click the translation button on the menu bar to translate the selected text. If necessary, you can translate the entire page, and you can also find definitions of technical terms and related background information.

4. Highlight - FREE
  When you want to remember important parts of a paper or references, select the text and highlight it so that you can easily find it later. The highlighted parts are distinguished by color, and you can choose from several colors.

5. Citation Preview - PRO
  When you want to understand the content or importance of a cited paper, simply hover your mouse over the cited paper link to see the title, author, and abstract of the cited paper. This allows you to quickly understand the main content of the paper and determine whether the paper is worth reading.

6. Preview - FREE
  Hovering over a hyperlink previews the contents of the section or reference without moving the page.

7. AI Image Explanation - PRO
  When the graphs, images, and formulas in the paper are complex and require additional explanation for the visual data, you can hold down Ctrl and drag to see a detailed explanation of the captured image. This helps you better understand the visual data, such as the meaning of the graph or image and the step-by-step solution to the formula.

8. Link Explanation - PRO
  If you want to understand additional information or related background of an external link included in a paper, hovering over the link will provide a summary of the content and explain the part you must read or the meaning of the link within the link. This will help you utilize external resources more effectively.

9. Citation Explanation - PRO
  When you need to understand more deeply the importance of the cited paper and its relevance to the paper you are currently viewing, click the Explain button after previewing the cited paper. Summarize the cited paper and explain the connection to the current paper, the reason for citation, etc. Through this, you can determine why the paper was cited and its value.

10. Bookmark - FREE
  When you want to manage important papers or papers you want to read later, click the Favorites button to extract and save the title, journal, author, publication date, abstract, etc. based on the first page of the current paper. You can check and manage favorited papers at a glance on the library page.

How to use
1. If you want to open local PDF, you must open with chrome and enable access to file URLs in the chrome extension.
